short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension sets your search to Safe2Search to provide you with a one click safe search and browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate Your Browsing Experience Safely
Safe2Search instantly increases your online safety by filtering explicit adult content from your search results, ensuring a secure and family-friendly internet experience. With an easy toggle feature, you get full control over switching this protection on or off.


Key Highlights:
1. Effective Content Filtering: Automatically blocks suggestive content to maintain a clean browsing space.

2. Simplicity and Efficiency: Designed for ease, offering a straightforward method to manage your online safety.

Quick and Easy Setup
Installing Safe2Search is quick and with minimal effort, providing immediate protection against inappropriate content.  
Whether for individual or family use, it's the perfect tool for enhancing internet safety.

Important Notice! This extension changes your Default Search in Chrome browser to Yahoo Search. 

Embrace safer online browsing with Safe2Search. Download now and take a step towards an easy & safer browsing experience.

About - https://www.safe2search.com
Contact - https://www.safe2search.com/contact
TOS - https://www.safe2search.com/tos
Privacy - https://www.safe2search.com/privacy
Uninstall - https://www.safe2search.com/uninstall
